Detailed Description

Translate chat from X language to Y language from chat Example to turn on translator translator en >> fr translator en > fr translator fr << en translator fr < en Example to enable/disable the translator translator settings enabled true/false Example to show the old text previous to translating translator settings showold = true/false Help for the translator translator help.
